title: ERROR
body:
every single time i want to game this game.
I get kicked out and need to recconect, but it doesnt always help lots of times i cant join the game CUZ OF RIOT.
when is this going to be fixed...

replies.body: I'd like to help get you back in game but need more specifics of the issue.  What error exactly are you seeing?  When specifically is it happening?

> [{quoted}](name=Cheesy King,realm=EUW,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=xezZsEJM,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-12-17T17:01:35.586+0000)
>
> every time i start a game i need to reconnect usually its ok and it does recconect but lately i am getting kicked out of the game and cant login on the game no more.
> this causes a lot of frustration towards the game

every time i start a game i need to reconnect usually its ok and it does recconect but lately i am getting kicked out of the game and cant login on the game no more.
this causes a lot of frustration towards the game
